seoDescription: Upload a portrait and instantly turn it into a fitness hero visual—ideal for transformation reveals, motivational posts, and brand campaigns.

hero.heading: Free AI Muscle Generator
hero.description: Drop in a single photo and let AI add sculpted muscles, cinematic lighting, and sweat details. Perfect for fitness creators, before-and-after reveals, and aspirational ads.

gallery.heading: Preview the Looks
gallery.subheading: Switch between competition-ready physiques, gritty street edits, and photoreal gym shots.

galleryItems.title: Stage Competition
galleryItems.description: High-contrast lighting emphasizes every muscle group for show-day impact.

galleryItems.title: Urban Power
galleryItems.description: Cold neon tones and grain textures deliver a hardcore street aesthetic.

galleryItems.title: Gym Reality
galleryItems.description: Natural lighting and sweat sheen recreate an in-session workout vibe.

items.title: Smart Body Sculpting
items.description: AI analyzes proportions and adds realistic muscle definition and veins.

items.title: Lighting Presets
items.description: Choose daylight, stage lights, or neon for the perfect dramatic tone.

items.title: Prompt-Level Control
items.description: Fine-tune muscle volume, outfits, backgrounds, and facial expressions.

items.title: Multi-Scenario Output
items.description: Use it for transformation ads, class promos, social inspiration, or character design.

valueProps.heading: Why Creators Choose This Muscle Generator
valueProps.description: Deliver premium transformation visuals in minutes with no manual retouching.

items.title: Beginner Friendly
items.description: Upload, adjust, export—no design or editing background required.

items.title: Pro-Level Details
items.description: Muscle fibers, vascularity, and sweat reflections stay sharp and believable.

items.title: Model Flexibility
items.description: Access multiple providers and pick the model that matches your brand style.

moreEffects.heading: More Body & Motion Effects
moreEffects.description: Keep experimenting with dance, street, and fitness-inspired templates.

items.question: How many photos do I need?
items.answer: One clear portrait or half-body shot is enough to generate the muscle edit.

items.question: Can I adjust the muscle intensity?
items.answer: Yes—use prompts or advanced settings to control how dramatic the transformation looks.

items.question: Does it support batch creation?
items.answer: You can upload multiple photos to process a full campaign or team roster.

items.question: What export formats are available?
items.answer: Download high-resolution images or motion clips suitable for social and ads.

items.question: Is there a cost?
items.answer: Core renderings are free; premium presets may require a few credits.
